verses.text: In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.
verses.translation: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

verses.text: [All] praise is [due] to Allah, Lord of the worlds -
verses.translation: [All] praise is [due] to Allah, Lord of the worlds -

verses.text: The Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful,
verses.translation: The Most Gracious, the Most Merciful,

verses.text: Sovereign of the Day of Recompense.
verses.translation: Master of the Day of Judgment.

verses.text: It is You we worship and You we ask for help.
verses.translation: You alone we worship, and You alone we ask for help.

verses.text: Guide us to the straight path -
verses.translation: Guide us to the straight path,

verses.text: The path of those upon whom You have bestowed favor, not of those who have evoked [Your] anger or of those who are astray.
verses.translation: the path of those whom You have favored, not of those who have earned [Your] anger, nor of those who go astray.
